Text:
Fantastic - thanks again for the great upload.

Have a safe and happy holidays.

Just of of curiosity, how many of the musical legends are in the collection? I feel like I am back in  1986 - anyone have a smoke machine and a strobe light?  LOL    I need to find my medallion for the Hippodrome.

My strobe ligt , Mirrorglobe and lots of lightorgans are finding a use again .. Long live the 80's ;o) 

Thanks anno67 you are doing what the recordindustri are failing at .. ;o)
